Dean,

Though I was not introduced to your father until late in life, he an=
d I had two wonderful discussions on Bizen blades.

I hope his books go to =
excellent homes. A pdf of the lot would be good, and I recommend posting it=
 to the Nihonto Message Board as well. If necessary, I will help with that.=


Curran



________________________________
 From: Dean Hartley <dshartley=
3@...>
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Monday, November 21,=
 2011 11:10 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Comptons collection
 

=C2=A0 
I=
 have the opposite problem.  My father, Col Dean S. Hartley, Jr., left a la=
rge selection of reference books, most in Japanese.  I will be selling thes=
e once I have an idea of what they are.  I want them to go to people who wi=
ll use them.  I want to get a fair, but not exhorbitant price for them.

My=
 thought is to take photos of the covers or title pages and make a pdf of t=
he lot.  Does this appear to be a useful approach?

Dean Hartley
Dr. Dean S=
. Hartley III

kfull!
